name: Strongly Connected Components (SCC)
scenarios: Finding maximal strongly connected subgraphs in directed graphs
缩点 (Shrinking SCCs into nodes to form a DAG)
extensions: Tarjan's algorithm can be extended to find bridges, articulation points, and biconnected components in undirected graphs.
Kosaraju's algorithm is conceptually simpler and easier to verify due to its two-pass DFS structure.
